question: The 2nd Regional Conference on Deendayal Disabled Rehabilitation Scheme was held in which of the following places of India?
explanation: The 2nd Regional Conference on Deendayal Disabled Rehabilitation Scheme was held in Mumbai, Maharashtra. the event was organized by the Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment. The Government of India provides financial assistance to NGOs working in the field of education and rehabilitation of persons with disabilities through the DDRS scheme.
